title: Replace placeholder Motivational Life Lessons videos with playable YouTube links

requirements.summary: Replace every placeholder YouTube URL in the Motivational Life Lessons dataset with a real, playable YouTube URL and a matching max-res thumbnail URL while preserving all existing ids and category tags.
acceptanceCriteria: In `frontend/src/content/mentalPerformance/motivationalLifeLessonsVideos.ts`, there are no `youtubeUrl` values containing `placeholder`.
In the Motivational Life Lessons page, no video cards show the "Coming Soon" overlay (which is currently triggered by `video.youtubeUrl.includes('placeholder')`).
Clicking any video card in the Motivational Life Lessons page opens the player dialog and shows an embedded YouTube video (not the "Video unavailable" fallback).
For each updated video, the thumbnail loads successfully and matches the YouTube video ID used in the `youtubeUrl` (i.e., `thumbnailUrl` uses the same `<VIDEO_ID>`).

file_operations.description: For every `MotivationalVideo` entry where `youtubeUrl` contains the substring `placeholder`, manually search YouTube for the correct matching video and replace only: (1) `youtubeUrl` with the real `youtube.com/watch?v=...` or `youtu.be/...` URL, and (2) `thumbnailUrl` with `https://img.youtube.com/vi/<VIDEO_ID>/maxresdefault.jpg` where `<VIDEO_ID>` matches the updated `youtubeUrl`. Do not change any existing `id` values, category tags, or non-URL copy.
